title: VA moves to suspend new GI bill enrollment at 5 universities
description: The Department of Veterans Affairs is moving to bar new GI Bill students from enrolling at five universities, citing "advertising, sales or enrollment practices that are erroneous, deceptive or misleading.” The schools were identified as the University of Pho…
